name: Big Chief
description:
Start your own company! 

Fire your own employees! 
Guide your own way to success!
Get fired yourself!
Receive your own severance package!
Start all over again!

Big Chief is the ultimate Swipe-em-up for Corporate-America-Enthusiasts!

Found your way up the Executive ladder, one CEO position at a time! 

Sick of your employees…
- Suggesting bad advertisements?
- Wasting materials?
- Not refilling the coffee pot?
- Peppering you with annoying movie quotes?

SWIPE LEFT TO FIRE THEM

over 5000 unique questions, employee details, severance package options, and other content to make your bizarre corporate experience one-of-a-kind and completely hilarious.
